title: The Last Question
desc:
An Independent Project By Will Davis 
 A Science Fiction Folk Event Based on Issac Asimov's short story "The Last Question".  
 
 Entropy(n) en?tro?py \?en-tr?-p?\-  
 1. The degree of disorder or uncertainty in a system 
 2.The degredation of the matter and energy in the universe to an ultimate state of inert uniformity.
